con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="${#Project#loyaltyEndpoint}"/> <resources base="${#Project#loyaltyEndpoint}"> <resource path="v1/profiles" id="Profiles"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Profiles"/> <resource path="{profileId}" id="ProfileActions"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="ProfileActions"/> <param name="profileId" default="profileId" type="xs:string" required="false" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <resource path="transactions/{transactionId}" id="GetTransactions"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="GetTransactions"/> <param name="profileId" default="profileId" type="xs:string" required="false" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <param name="transactionId" default="transactionId" type="xs:string" required="false" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <method name="GET" id="TransactionsByID"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="TransactionsByID"/> <request/> <response status="400 401 404 500"> <representation mediaType="application/json; charset=UTF-8" element="tran:Fault" xmlns:tran="${#Project#loyaltyEndpoint}/v1/profiles/profileId/transactions/transactionId"/> </response> <response status="405"> <representation mediaType="" element="data"/> <representation mediaType="" element="data"/> <representation mediaType="" element="data"/> <representation mediaType="" element="data"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="activities" id="ProcessActivities"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="ProcessActivities"/> <param name="profileId" default="profileId" type="xs:string" required="false" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <method name="POST" id="Activities"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Activities"/> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response status="201"> <representation mediaType="application/json; charset=UTF-8" element="act:Response" xmlns:act="${#Project#loyaltyEndpoint}/v1/profiles/c716cd87-164b-4048-889f-52ae53426ea9/activities"/> </response> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="POST" id="ReactivateCertificates"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="ReactivateCertificates"/> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/json; charset=UTF-8" element="act:Fault" xmlns:act="${#Project#loyaltyEndpoint}/v1/profiles/c716cd87-164b-4048-889f-52ae53426ea9/activities"/> </response> </method> <method name="POST" id="AddOnlineOrderTransaction"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="AddOnlineOrderTransaction"/> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="400 401"> <representation mediaType="application/json; charset=UTF-8" element="act:Fault" xmlns:act="${#Project#loyaltyEndpoint}/v1/profiles/6fce566c-641c-445d-95c3-21c686a51b4c/activities"/> </response> <response status="201"> <representation mediaType="application/json; charset=UTF-8" element="act:Response" xmlns:act="${#Project#loyaltyEndpoint}/v1/profiles/6fce566c-641c-445d-95c3-21c686a51b4c/activities"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="sysoffers" id="Sysoffers"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Sysoffers"/> <param name="profileId" default="profileId" type="xs:string" required="false" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <method name="GET" id="ProgramOffers"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="ProgramOffers"/> <request/> <response status="401"> <representation mediaType="application/json; charset=UTF-8" element="sys:Fault" xmlns:sys="${#Project#loyaltyEndpoint}/v1/profiles/6fce566c-641c-445d-95c3-21c686a51b4c/sysoffers"/> </response> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json; charset=UTF-8" element="Response"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="{username}/password" id="PasswordReset"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="PasswordReset"/> <param name="profileId" default="profileId" type="xs:string" required="false" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <param name="username" default="username" type="xs:string" required="false" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <method name="PUT" id="PasswordReset"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="PasswordReset"/> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="400 401 500"> <representation mediaType="application/json; charset=UTF-8" element="pas:Fault" xmlns:pas="${#Project#loyaltyEndpoint}/v1/profiles/2ccfc441-a1e2-4bd9-8a55-1716938318e0/TESTBWW3%40GMAIL.COM/password"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="pointBalance" id="PointBalance"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="PointBalance"/> <param name="profileId" default="profileId" type="xs:string" required="false" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <param name="status" type="xs:string" required="false" default="" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <method name="GET" id="CheckPointBalance"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="CheckPointBalance"/> <request/> <response status="400 401 403 404"> <representation mediaType="application/json; charset=UTF-8" element="poin:Fault" xmlns:poin="${#Project#loyaltyEndpoint}/v1/profiles/6fce566c-641c-445d-95c3-21c686a51b4c/pointBalance"/> </response> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json; charset=UTF-8" element="poin:Response" xmlns:poin="${#Project#loyaltyEndpoint}/v1/profiles/6fce566c-641c-445d-95c3-21c686a51b4c/pointBalance"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="rewardCertificate" id="POST | RewardCertificate"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="POST | RewardCertificate"/> <param name="profileId" default="profileId" type="xs:string" required="false" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <method name="POST" id="RedeemRewards"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="RedeemRewards"/> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="400 401 404"> <representation mediaType="application/json; charset=UTF-8" element="rew:Fault" xmlns:rew="${#Project#loyaltyEndpoint}/v1/profiles/profileId/rewardCertificate"/> </response> <response status="200 201"> <representation mediaType="application/json; charset=UTF-8" element="rew:Response" xmlns:rew="${#Project#loyaltyEndpoint}/v1/profiles/profileId/rewardCertificate"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="rewardCertificate" id="GET | RewardCertificate"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="GET | RewardCertificate"/> <param name="profileId" default="profileId" type="xs:string" required="false" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <param name="status" type="xs:string" required="false" default="" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <param name="rewardCode"
